title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Astronomy Programs
body: Astronomy Programs         Ranger Janice conducts an astronomy program at Keller Campground. C. Hanson/NPS  Look up and explore the universe far beyond the park.  Lake Roosevelt offers the following programs on a very limited basis:  Solar System Round-up Constellation Connection  Activities are from Astronomy From the Ground Up and presented by a National Park Service Sky Ranger.  Choose from the links above or contact our educational specialist for more information.
